column4: often the bios setup utility or the laptop vendor's website provides a utility for recalibrating the battery
recalibrating the battery will help with the drain?
of course, you can and should also try saving power by using tools such as acpi and that amd specific cpu speedup/-down utility cpufreq

recalibrating the battery will help in terms of correctly knowing when the power really wears off. batteries which have run for a long time have memory effect and/or similar other effects which can mkae the system believe that power wears off earlier than it actually does.
